name: D'No Evil
description:
Overview

You can move when you can see no evil.

Find all keys to unlock the door trapping you in the mansion. Do you hear that?? Sounded like a ghost.

Goals

Find all the keys to unlock the door.

Hook

Open your eyes to see where you go, then close your eyes to move. You cant move as you look around.

Pillars

Puzzles

Exploration 

Traversal without sight 

3Cs

Camera : First Person

Character : The person trapped in the mansion

Controls : Mouse and Keyboard (WASD and mouse clicking)

  • Move: WASD
  • Interact: Left Mouse Button
  • Close Eyes: Right Mouse Button
